meta.name: BURSTPAY
meta.about:
BURSTPAY -
Green & Smart Blockchain Payment Platform, helps SMBs who care about data privacy & ownership, to make trustless transactions instantly & globally. Featured smart contracts automation, data verifiability, and public traceability. 

中小微企的智能區塊鏈支付平台 - 自動|驗證|追源|. 結合咗環保同智能區塊鏈技術嘅比錢APP，保護你嘅交易資料同數據，即時同全世界用戶交易，配合埋智能合約按你需要自動執行交易退錢或驗證追源。”正嘢? 邊到用邊到再買!”
